amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the appropriation for military construction for the Army National Guard by $2.6 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 10 in the Congressional Record of June 16, to reduce funds appropriated in the bill for the Army National Guard by $2.6 million. The intent of the bill would be to deny funding for a weapons target range in Tullahoma, TN.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gutierrez amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 214 - 216 (Roll no. 396).
